description:
Job Summary:

Our client is seeking a Leave and Accommodations Specialist to join their team! This position is completely remote.


Duties:

  • Responsible for the management of the overall leave and accommodation process
  • Provide information, interpretation, guidance and consultation on escalations that may arise as a result of a leave or accommodation
  • Collect, organize, interpret, and verify internal customer needs and translates them into business policies, procedures and practices
  • Responsible for vendor oversight on all cases to ensure program compliance with state and federal regulations as well as company policies
  • Enhance the overall leave of absence and accommodation customer experience by providing excellent, efficient, and courteous service
  • Effectively manages highly complex leave and accommodation escalated cases from all levels within the organization and Human Resources
  • Responsible for all aspects of complex ADA processes and outcomes including interactive dialogue with employee, manager, and Employee Relations representative
  • Partner closely with vendor, manager, Employee Relations, and Legal to evaluate and research issues regarding complex leave and accommodation cases
  • Serve as a resource to management in addressing leave and accommodation matters


Desired Skills/Experience:

  • 4+ years of experience
  • Human Resources background, preferably in the leave space
  • Experience with Workday and ServiceNow


Benefits:

  • Medical, Dental, & Vision Insurance Plans
  • 401K offered
